curam.util.administration.intf

Interface PropertyAdmin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    curam.util.administration.base.PropertyAdmin, PropertyAdmin, PropertyAdminFactory

    public interface PropertyAdmin
    The Properties Management Administration interface. Properties are internally stored in a cache that can be updated using the publishPropertyChanges function.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • readAllProperties

        PropertyAndDescriptionDetailsList readAllProperties(java.lang.String locale,
                                                    java.lang.String category)
                                             throws AppException,
                                                    InformationalException
        Reads all the Property details from the database, optionally filtering on Language code and/or category.
        Parameters:
        locale - Optional locale to filter the list by.
        category - Optional category to filter the list by.
        Returns:
        List of Property and description details.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • addProperty

        long addProperty(NewPropertyDetails details)
          throws AppException,
                 InformationalException
        Add a property.
        Parameters:
        details - Details in relation to a property.
        Returns:
        Property ID assigned to the new property.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_WITH_NAME_EXISTS - if a property with the same name exists.
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_NAME_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY - if an empty name is provided.
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_TYPE_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY - if an empty type is provided.
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_CATEGORY_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY - if an empty category is provided.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • modifyProperty

             throws AppException,
                    InformationalException
        Modify a property.
        Parameters:
        details - Details in relation to a property.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_NOT_FOUND - if the property to modify could not be found.
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_WITH_NAME_EXISTS - if a property with the same name exists.
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_NAME_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY - if an empty name is provided.
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_TYPE_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY - if an empty type is provided.
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_CATEGORY_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY - if an empty category is provided.

        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • publishPropertyChanges

        void publishPropertyChanges()
                     throws AppException,
                            InformationalException
        Publish any changes to the Property cache.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
        AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_PROPERTY_CACHE_LOAD_FAILURE - if the property cache could not be loaded.
        AppRuntimeException - if a naming exception occurs
        AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_MESSAGE_SEND_FAILED - if the JMS service reported any errors while trying to send the message.
        AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_MESSAGE_CREATION_FAILED - if message creation fails due to an internal error in the JMS service.

      • modifyPropertyDescription

        void modifyPropertyDescription(PropertyDescriptionKey key,
                               PropertyDescriptionDetails descriptionDetails)
                        throws AppException,
                               InformationalException
        Modify a property description.
        Parameters:
        key - The property description key.
        descriptionDetails - The property description details.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_DESCRIPTION_EXISTS - if the language code is changed to one that is already in use.
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_DESC_NOT_FOUND - if the description to be modified cannot be found.
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_DESC_LOCALE_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY - if an empty locale is provided.
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_DESC_DISPLAYNAME_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY - if an empty displayName is provided.
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

                               InformationalException
        Remove a property description.

        Throws:
        AppException - ID_PROPERTY_DESC_NOT_FOUND - if the Property description cannot be found.
        AppException - ID_LAST_DESCRIPTION_CANNOT_BE_DELETED - if an attempt is made to delete the last description.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
